Package com.example.business.data.services

Class AbstractService<E,​K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.business.data.services.AbstractService<E,​K>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The DAO
    K - The type of id this DAO uses.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FavoritesService, FoodRatingsService, FoodService, RestaurantService, TicketService, UserService
    @Repository
public abstract class AbstractService<E,​K>
extends java.lang.Object
    The bulk of the backend business logic. All of the service classes do the some functions, this abstract class cuts down on the repetitive functions by using generics.
    Author:
    Will
